amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Citizens Corps program by $20 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase by $20,000,000 the Citizen Corps.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
